devdoc.author: rashtrakoff
devdoc.custom:experimental: This is an experimental contract/library. Use at your own risk.

params._user: Address of the user whose uninvested amount needs to be calculated
Address of the user whose withdrawable amount needs to be calculated

returns._0: Amount that can be withdrawn immediately
Boolean indicating working status of core

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to be withdrawn

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: Function to withdraw a token in case of emergency

params._token: Address of the pool token Remove/Modify this function after testing

returns._0: Returns address of the dHedge pool this core contract serves

moveLPT().details: Moves the LP tokens from core to bank. May be called iff keepers fail.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requireUpkeep().details: Checks if deposit action can be performed

returns._0: Boolean indicating if upkeep/deposit can be performed

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: Amount of uninvested token to be withdrawn

devdoc.title: Core contract for a dHedge pool

calcUserUninvested(address,address).notice: Calculates uninvested token amount of a particular user

calcWithdrawable(address).notice: Calculates withdrawable amount. Also accounts for cooldown period.

checkCoreActive().notice: Checks if the core is active or not

dHedgeDeposit().notice: Converts supertokens to underlying tokens and deposits them into dHedge pool

dHedgeWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws LP tokens of the pool to the caller

withdrawUninvestedAll().notice: Withdraws all the uninvested tokens of the caller

withdrawUninvestedSingle(address,uint256.notice: Withdraws uninvested tokens in a specific amount
